title: Howlinâ€™ Heart
lyrics:
Why do I bathe in the sunshine?
Why don't I bark at the moon?
'Cause you're alive
Keep you mine
And why don't I shout at your sister?

Why don't I burn down your friends?

'Cause you're mine

Funny all of the time



Would you like to do it?

? until you're thinking of change

But, I'm not

? until you're thinking of change, change, change



Are you lonely?

'Cause, baby, I'm lonely too

Do you want me?

Doubt it's more than I want you



Fools go out robbing the crew

Wise men go with the ghosts and their bones

Slide me out -



Would you like to do it?

? until you're thinking of change

But, I'm not -

? until you're thinking of change, change, change



Are you ?

'Cause, baby, come and pay me ?

Do you want me?

Doubt it's more than I want you



It feels like I'm holding

I know ?

? you
